title: r/Maliciouscompliance LOL If You Say So!
description:
r/Maliciouscompliance In today's episode, OP is a hardworking employee at IHOP, and he has the worst boss imaginable. She's mean, condescending, and creates an incredibly toxic work environment for OP. Eventually OP decides to stand up to her, so she gives that classic line, "If you don't like working here, just quit!" So that's what OP does, in the most hilarious method possible! His boss is completely shocked and embarrassed by what he did! If you like this podcast and want more, hit the follow button for daily Reddit podcasts!
